info.author: Pablo Saavedra
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Available Plugins
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Facebook
========

 * Facebook Comments
 * Facebook Facepile
 * Facebook Likebox
 * Facebook Like button
 * Facebook Login button
 * Facebook Live stream


Pending Plugins
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Facebox plugins
===============

 * Send Button
 * Subscribe Button
 * Recommendations Box
 * Activity Feed
 * Registration
 * Recommendations bar

Twitter plugins
===============

 * Twitter Tweet button
 * Twitter Follow button
 * Twitter Tweet Hashtag button
 * Twitter Tweet to button
 * Embedded Tweets
 
 
Notes
---------------------------------------------------------------------


About Facebook plugins
======================

Social networks plugins as Facebook Comments plugin need add the 
*xmlns* block on the *html* tag of the *.html* template. For 
example::

  <html 
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" {%render_block "xmlns" %}
  >

info.name: django-cms-social-networks
info.html_description:
Available Plugins

Facebook

  • Facebook Comments
  • Facebook Facepile
  • Facebook Likebox
  • Facebook Like button
  • Facebook Login button
  • Facebook Live stream

Pending Plugins

Facebox plugins

  • Send Button
  • Subscribe Button
  • Recommendations Box
  • Activity Feed
  • Registration
  • Recommendations bar

Twitter plugins

  • Twitter Tweet button
  • Twitter Follow button
  • Twitter Tweet Hashtag button
  • Twitter Tweet to button
  • Embedded Tweets

Notes

About Facebook plugins

Social networks plugins as Facebook Comments plugin need add the xmlns block on the html tag of the .html template. For example:

<html
 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" {%render_block "xmlns" %}
>
